## New York Taxi driver data

<http://chriswhong.com/open-data/foil_nyc_taxi/>

This data is used to [explain the usage](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/andrie/RHadoop-tutorial/blob/master/2-Taxi-analysis-with-RHadoop.html#/1) of R in combination with [hadoop](http://hortonworks.com/tutorials/)
